item.title: A Team Project Failure
item.description: Q: Tell me about a time when a team project failed. A: similar situation. Situation and tasks: did not deliver analysis reports. Actions: Business analysis, decide to hire staff, and worked with union to finalize the process. Streamline data processing. Results: went through smoothly next year.
